mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (ID, Password, Name, Email, Dept, Rank, Birth, Years, Salary) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{dept}, #{rank}, #{birth}, #{years}, #{salary})
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM member WHERE Email = #{email} AND Name = #{name}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE ID = #{userId} AND Email = #{email}
SELECT ID AS userId, Password AS password, Name AS name, Email AS email, Dept AS dept, Years AS years, Salary AS salary, Rank AS rank, Birth AS birth FROM member
